item.title: Diversity Statement
item.description: In Becoming Qualitative Researchers: An Introduction (2016), Corrine Glesne argued that to establish the trustworthiness of qualitative research, a researcher must reflect on their positionality, answering, â€œWhy do I notice what I notice?
